events.message: We have received the application of John Doe for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with strong experience in backend development.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering given the clear software development background and relevant skills listed.
Recruiter Sarah Thompson has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this software engineer candidate.
Initial phone screening was conducted successfully, and the candidate demonstrated good technical understanding and communication skills.
Received a positive response from the candidate, expressing enthusiasm for the role and availability for technical interview scheduling.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 2 PM with the senior engineering panel.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in coding challenges.
HR interview has been scheduled for May 7th to discuss company culture fit and compensation expectations.
HR interview completed successfully, the candidate showed alignment with our core values and discussed goals clearly.
An offer including base salary, signing bonus, and benefits has been proposed to the candidate for the software engineer position.
Candidate expressed appreciation for the offer and requested clarification on some benefits before providing final acceptance.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer and is excited to join the engineering team next month.
Onboarding process has been initiated including account setup, orientation scheduling, and first day preparations.
The hiring process has been successfully completed and the new software engineer is now officially part of the team.
